Settings.ShowWelcomeDialogHint: Show the welcome dialog on module startup

Welcome.Title: The Lightning Lord's Lament
Welcome.Heading: Welcome to The Lightning Lord's Lament for Foundry VTT!
Welcome.Info: To get started, use the 'Import Content' button at the bottom of this dialog to import The Lightning Lord's Lament Compendia into your world. You only need to do this once.
Welcome.Credits:
Credits

Foundry VTT conversion by Tim L. White.

See the Credits journal entry for other credits.

Welcome.DoNotShow: Do not show this message on startup
Welcome.DoNotShowHint: Do not show this welcome dialog again until it is re-enabled in the Module Settings dialog.

ContentImporter.Title: Import Module Content
ContentImporter.Heading: Import Module Content
ContentImporter.Info:
Use the checkboxes below to select content to import into your world. The defaults are our recommended content to import.

Imported content will be placed into folders to minimise clutter.

All Module Content is always available from the  Compendium Packs tab while this module is loaded regardless of what is imported into the world.
